Description:
Responsibilities:Oversee and manage all operational aspects of the perfume brand in Riyadh, including retail stores, inventory management, logistics, and customer service.
Develop and implement operational strategies to optimize efficiency, productivity, and profitability.
Establish and maintain strong relationships with suppliers, distributors, and partners to ensure timely delivery of products and services.
Monitor and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) to identify areas for improvement and implement appropriate measures.
Collaborate with the marketing team to plan and execute promotional activities and campaigns to drive sales and brand awareness.
Manage and motivate a team of employees, providing coaching, training, and performance feedback to ensure high levels of productivity and customer satisfaction.
Ensure compliance with company policies, procedures, and legal regulations at all times.
Conduct regular market research to stay updated with industry trends and competitor activities.Skills
Skills: Are you an experienced and dynamic professional looking for an exciting opportunity in the world of perfumes? We are currently seeking a talented Operation Manager to join our prestigious perfume brand in Riyadh. As an Operation Manager, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our business, contributing to its growth and success.

Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Operations Management, or a related field. A master's degree is a plus.
Proven experience of at least 5 years in operations management, preferably in the retail or perfume industry.
Strong leadership skills with the ability to effectively manage a diverse team and foster a positive work environment.
Excellent problem-solving and decision-making abilities to handle operational challenges and meet business objectives.
